items.sentence: I'll make sure nobody hears about this incident.
I don't think that that's such a good idea, Tom.
You aren't going to tell Tom the truth, are you?
You hope Tom doesn't make us do that, don't you?
We'll do that even if it's the last thing we do.
Tom has been sick in bed for about three months.
When Ahmad was a boy, he could climb tall trees.
Tom owns about thirty acres not far from Boston.
With every second I was feeling worse and worse.
Tom knew that something had gone horribly wrong.
